events.name: Production of battery materials
events.wd_description: The production of battery materials has been identified as the main contributor to produce cleaner batteries.

events.name: Data transparency and quality
events.wd_description: Industrial scale primary data related to the production of battery materials lacks transparency and is often outdated or incomplete.

events.name: Data gaps
events.wd_description: Existing life cycle inventory datasets for graphite production are incomplete and not representative of current practices.

events.name: Life cycle inventory (LCI) data
events.wd_description: The importance of accurate and up-to-date LCI data for robust evaluations of the environmental impacts of battery materials.

events.name: Data quality improvement
events.wd_description: Efforts to improve the quality and transparency of LCI data for graphite production.
